item.title: WordPress Installation on Ubuntu 20.04
item.description: Wordpress Installation on Ubuntu Server 20.04 Introduction WordPress is a free and open-source content management system written in PHP and paired with a MySQL or MariaDB database. Features include a plugin architecture and a template system, referred to within WordPress as Themes. For more information you can go to this link The homepage is here Agenda Update repositories Install necessary packages Do some configurations
